import "./about.css"; import TypeWriter from "typewriter-effect"; const About = () => { return (

About Me

{" "} { typewriter .typeString("From Traditional Finance") .pauseFor(2000) .deleteAll() .typeString(" To The DeFi Future") .pauseFor(2000) .deleteAll() .typeString("From Traditional Finance, To The DeFi Future") .start(); }} options={{ strings: ["Hello", "World"], autoStart: true, loop: true, }} />

Previously worked in an international bank as management trainee. Have a deep understand of how the traditional financial services institutions work in modern society. Interest investment blog writer. Now equipping myself towards the DeFi world as smart contract developer in Cardano ecosystem.

Academic Records

Renowned University First Class Honour Graduate

Dean's List in all academic years

Multiple Business Case Competition Awards

); }; export default About;
